Class Quadtree<T>

Namespace
FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.Spatial
Assembly
FlowGraph.Avalonia.dll

A Quadtree spatial index for O(log N) point and range queries on 2D rectangles.

public class Quadtree<T> where T : class

Type Parameters

T

The type of item stored in the quadtree.

Inheritance
object
Quadtree<T>

object.ToString()

Remarks

This implementation uses a point-region quadtree where each node subdivides into 4 quadrants (NW, NE, SW, SE) when capacity is exceeded.

Performance characteristics:

  • Insert: O(log N) average, O(N) worst case for degenerate distributions
  • Query: O(log N + k) where k is number of results
  • Clear: O(1)

Constructors

Quadtree(Rect, int, int)

Creates a new quadtree with the specified bounds.

public Quadtree(Rect bounds, int maxItemsPerNode = 8, int maxDepth = 10)

Parameters

bounds Rect

The bounding rectangle for the entire quadtree.

maxItemsPerNode int

Maximum items per node before subdivision (default 8).

maxDepth int

Maximum tree depth to prevent infinite subdivision (default 10).

Queries for all items whose bounds contain the specified point.
